ai-patthana23.10:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.10:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the river, the objection of a trainee.
ai-patthana23.10:1.1_0: There is no skilled in the teaching of the unskillful, a trainee, a condition for the trainee.
ai-patthana23.10:2.1_0: You don’t have the virtue of an unintelligent teaching, and a cause.
ai-patthana23.10:3.1_0: There is no such thing as unskillful qualities.
